department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking a standing offer from a qualified supplier (or suppliers) for the supply of underground water and sewer materials, including ductile and cast iron pipes, valves, hydrants, and other items.
description: The contract is for one year with an option to extend for an additional year. The services will be required to supply and deliver underground water and sewer components to the Canadian Forces Bases in Borden. The procurement is under the Public Services and Procurement Canada umbrella. },
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Underground Water and Sewer Materials (W6854-240335B) - General Stream

#### Reference and Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4534804840-Doc4574959769
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4534804840
* **Publication Date**: May 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

#### Acquisition and Sourcing

* **Tender Status**: Expiré
* **Species Category**: GD
* **Request for Standing Offer**: Demande d’offre à commandes
* **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

#### Procurement Requirements

* **Scope of Work**: The contractor will supply and deliver underground water and sewer components, including valves, hydrants, and municipal casting, in accordance with the current Ontario edition of the Allpriser Blue Book for Watermain and Sewer Products.
* **Supply and Delivery**: The offeror will provide supply and delivery services to the Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Borden on an as-and-when-requested basis.
* **Standing Offer**: The offeror will provide a standing offer for Underground Water and Sewer Materials (W6854-240335B) - PSIB Stream for a period of one year, with the option to extend for an additional year.

#### Tendering and Evaluation

* **Evaluation Criteria**: Suppliers will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price, as outlined in the solicitation document.
* **Notification of Tender Rejection**: Suppliers will be notified in writing of the outcome of the tender.

#### Important Dates

* **Contract Start Date**: June 28, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: June 30, 2025

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**: Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC), sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
